definition: to wrap tightly/to wind tightly/to bind/close-fitting (clothes)
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: He was a heavy man in a tight-fitting yellow and blue uniform .
sentences.chinese: 他笨重的身體緊裹在黃藍相間的制服裏。

sentences.english: Eyes wide open now, I became immersed in thought.
sentences.chinese: 我睜大了眼，緊裹在深思中。
